column7: From: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
column8: this one really pisses me off.he knows that felda settlers are pissed big time because of their losses from the forced investments. so he pays them off using federal funds (our money lar, in other words) just to appease them.its straight out vote buying no matter how you want to hash it. there is no disguising it. i want to see if any macai can even explain it it any other way.
Because is najib, for every handout or project he approved you think he didn't get his slice?
